Blog.post: I thought I saw a man brought to life He was warm, he came around like he was dignified He showed me what it was to cry Well you couldn’t be that man I adored You don’t seem to know, don’t seem to care what your heart is for But I don’t know him anymore There’s nothing where he used to lie My conversation has run dry That’s what’s going on, nothing’s fine I’m torn I’m all out of faith, this is how I feel I’m cold and I am shamed lying naked on the floor Illusion never changed into something real I’m wide awake and I can see the perfect sky is torn You’re a little late, I’m already torn So I guess the fortune teller’s right Should have seen just what was there and not some holy light To crawl beneath my veins and now I don’t care, I have no luck, I don’t miss it all that much There’s just so many things that I can’t touch, I’m torn I’m all out of faith, this is how I feel I’m cold and I am shamed lying naked on the floor Illusion never changed into something real I’m wide awake and I can see the perfect sky is torn You’re a little late, I’m already torn. torn. There’s nothing where he used to lie My inspiration has run dryThat’s what’s going on, nothings right, I’m tornI’m all out of faith, this is how I feel I’m cold and I am shamed lying naked on the floor Illusion never changed into something real I’m wide awake and I can see the perfect sky is torn I’m all out of faith, this is how I feel I’m cold and I’m ashamed bound and broken on the floor You’re a little late, I’m already torn

yeaaa! quit council on FRIDAY 13! wahahahas. finally. waited for this day. lalalalas. too happy. arghs. but problem after problem. computer abit nutty. cant use. somemore it's BOTH! arghs. that why past weekend never go online. and bloggg! hahas. but here im back again! gladdd. this is week is really hectic! so busy. tests and more tests. neverending. im sooo sick of it. hols please come! HURRRRYYYY!hahas. i needa break. fortunately im not collapsing soon. and i hope i wont too! wahahahs. everyday is studyday! different subjects. hahas. well, im getting the hang of sec 3 already. some sort. that's good news for me! hahas... hope i'll do beta for final year. hahahas. one way jesus!

it used to be so so so beautiful. u bet. but.. this year. met with lots of problems, needed for me to overcome them myself. i really want a normal life. normal as in. i dont wanna be a councillor! but why isn't my mum respecting my decision. nagging about me being undecicive and all sorts of problems come in. grr. seriously pissed. can't someone just understand me? i jus hate my life.

just today, mrs yeoh wanted to see me. because on my performance in council. with the damn chinese teacher complaining about me. other teachers complaining about my talkativeness. arghs. pissed. i really really want to quit. i want a life that i really want. whatever stuff i do, there bound to be obstacles. it is like affecting my freedom. and of cos like duh. there are pros and cons. i want to quit. i have thought about this carefully already. but i just need an approval from my mother. hope she'll respect my decision, because council is not what i really want.=( goddddd save me! please cave a path that is right for me. i trust you. and i really do.

whole day at home. doing nothing/ rather it's something. just woke up. still in reverie. so boredd. practically whole day sleeping. wonder how i did that... din feel really tired. boredness leading to sleeping? hahas. probably? feeling rather lethargic. sleeping makes me feel even more tired. grr. wake me up!

Notice me, take my hand Why are we strangers when Our love is strong Why carry on without me Everytime I try to fly, I fall Without my wings, I feel so small I guess I need you, baby And everytime I see you in my dreams I see your face, it's haunting me I guess I need you, baby I make believe that you are here It's the only way I see clear What have I done You seem to move on easy And everytime I try to fly, I fall Without my wings, I feel so small I guess I need you, baby And everytime I see you in my dreams I see your face, you're haunting me I guess I need you, baby I may have made it rain Please forgive me My weakness caused you pain And this song's my sorry At night I pray That soon your face will fade away And everytime I try to fly, I fall Without my wings, I feel so small I guess I need you, baby And everytime I see you in my dreams I see your face, you're haunting me I guess I need you, baby
